description: When it comes to interviews or Behind the Scenes, these two turn into total goofballs. So we decided to see what happens if we let the models run the show. Needless to say it was hilarious. Randy has some fun pounding out Dean who took it better than he thought he would have. We even put a mirror on set so Dean could really see what he looked like while he was taking that monstrous cock. “When I first saw it I almost tapped out, but I figured it was worth a challenge. I’m actually pretty proud of myself.” As Dean should be he took it like a champ and let Randy go balls deep.
title: Randy & Dean: Bareback
